cookingTips: Keep corn moist by wrapping in damp paper towels to prevent drying out
Microwave on high for 1-2 minutes per ear, checking for tenderness
Corn will continue cooking slightly after removal from microwave
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Microwave cooking is quick and keeps corn moist. Do you know the right power level and timing for your microwave, or would you like general guidance?
